==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|あん|しん|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=あんしん}} compound {{m|ltc|安心|tr=*ʔan *sim}}. Compare modern {{cog|zh|安心|tr=ānxīn}}.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|あんしん|y=on|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

===Adjectival noun===
{{ja-adj|infl=na|あんしん}}

# [[unworrying]], [[safe]]

====Inflection====
{{ja-na|あんしん}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|あんしん}}

# [[relief]]
# [[lack]] of [[worry]], [[peace of mind]]

{{ja-noun|あんじん}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=あんじん|Buddhism}} [[equanimity]]

====Synonyms====
* {{sense|relief}} {{ja-r|安堵|あんど}}

====Compounds====
* {{ja-r|安心感|あんしんかん}}: sense of security
* {{ja-r|安心決定|あんしん けつじょう}}: {{qualifier|Buddhism}} chanting the name of Buddha with purity of heart and mind; firm belief; complete confidence in the future
* {{ja-r|安心決定鈔|あんしん けつじょう しょう|caps=y}}: {{qualifier|Buddhism}} a two-volume scripture in [[w:Pure Land Buddhism|Pure Land Buddhism]]
* {{ja-r|安心得道|あんしん とくどう}}: {{qualifier|Buddhism}} achieving [[nirvana]] through [[equanimity]] of [[spirit]]
* {{ja-r|安心立命|あんしん りつめい}}; {{ja-r|安心立命|あんじん りゅうめい}}; {{ja-r|安心立命|あんじん りゅうみょう}}: spiritual peace and enlightenment; keeping an unperturbed mind through faith
* {{ja-r|一安心|ひとあんしん}}: feeling of relief
* {{ja-r|不安心|ふあんしん}}: uneasiness, uncertainty

====Idioms====
* {{ja-r|安心無き読経は田中の蝦蟇の如し|あんしん なき どきょう は たなか の がま の ごとし|"a sutra recital without peace of mind is just like a toad in a paddy" → reciting the sutras without having the proper spiritual mindset is as meaningful as the croaking of a toad in a rice paddy}}

===Verb===
{{ja-verb-suru|tr=intrans|あんしん}}

# to have one's heart [[at ease]], to feel [[easy]], to be [[relieved]]
